page.title: 08INDUSTRY
page.content:
Farming has been covered on pages 2 and 3. The local council is attempting to encourage small businesses by building small industrial units to be let on a new estate in Nancegollan.
At present the units are let to a scaffolding contractor, an engine re-conditioning firm, a caravan repairer and a fibreglass boat repairer. The firms all started up recently and are either run by their owners only or employ a small staff.
There is no major source of employment within our area and the effects of this are covered on our employment page.
